item.title: 必和必拓提出社会经济措施以缓解英美资源集团对 490 亿美元竞购的担忧
item.description: 必和必拓集团周三表示，它已提出一系列社会经济措施，以消除英美资源集团对其386亿英镑（492.0亿美元）收购要约的担忧，并表示它认为英美资源集团需要更多时间进一步参与其提案。【原文：BHP Group said on Wednesday it had proposed a range of socioeconomic measures to address the concerns of Anglo American over its 38.6 billion pounds ($49.20 billion) offer, and that it believes it needs more time to further engage on its proposal.】

item.title: Uber 将在奥运高峰期提供塞纳河游船和巴黎一日游服务
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）周三推出了一系列措施，包括合作在塞纳河上提供游船服务，以满足即将在巴黎举行的奥运会所带来的爆炸性需求。【原文：Uber Technologies unveiled a raft of measures on Wednesday, including a tie-up to offer cruises on the Seine river as it looks to meet explosive demand stemming from the upcoming Olympics in Paris.】

item.title: 在市场中：在亚洲，人们会问，如何从美国脱险？
item.description: 上周，香港的一位欧洲私人财富经理告诉我，他最近获得了一个台湾亿万富翁账户所需的催化剂：地缘政治。【原文：A European private wealth manager in Hong Kong told me last week he recently got the catalyst he needed to land a Taiwanese billionaire's account: geopolitics.】

item.title: 早间竞标收益率飙升影响情绪
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 日本央行决策者暗示若日元下跌对通胀产生重大影响将加息
item.description: 日本央行董事会成员足立诚司（Seiji Adachi）周三表示，如果日元大幅下跌推动通胀或公众对未来物价的看法超出预期，日本央行可能会提高利率。【原文：The Bank of Japan may raise interest rates if sharp falls in the yen boost inflation or the public's perception of future prices move more than expected, board member Seiji Adachi said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 前 OpenAI 董事会成员首次详细讲述首席执行官下台事件
item.description: OpenAI 董事会前成员海伦-托纳（Helen Toner）在周二播出的 "泰德人工智能秀"（The Ted AI Show）播客采访中说，OpenAI 董事会是在推特上看到 ChatGPT 时才知道它的存在的。【原文：OpenAI's board only learned of the existence of ChatGPT when they saw it on Twitter, former board member Helen Toner said in an interview on "The Ted AI Show" podcast that aired Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储减息疑云再起，债券收益率攀升，股市承压
item.description: 美国国债收益率周三升至近四周高位，提振了亚太股市和美元，同时对股市构成压力，原因是数据对美联储降息的时机和幅度产生了新的疑虑。【原文：U.S. Treasury yields pushed to a near four-week peak on Wednesday, lifting their Asia-Pacific counterparts and the dollar while pressuring equities, as data sowed new doubts about the timing and extent of Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 韩国三星电子工会将采取罢工行动
item.description: 韩国三星电子工会的一名官员在周三举行的现场直播新闻发布会上表示，该工会已宣布将开始采取罢工行动，包括建议会员在 6 月 7 日休年假，作为最初的抗议行动。【原文：Samsung Electronics' union in South Korea has declared it will start taking strike action, including advising members as an initial protest to take annual leave on June 7, a union official said during a live-streamed press conference on Wednesday.】

item.title: 通胀数据公布前美元持稳，日元摇摆不定
item.description: 美元周三保持稳定，因为在本周公布关键的通胀数据之前，美联储可能不会在今年晚些时候降息，而日元则跌至四周来最弱。【原文：The dollar was stable on Wednesday on wagers the Federal Reserve is unlikely to cut rates until later this year ahead of crucial inflation readings this week, while the yen drifted to its weakest in four weeks.】

item.title: 一季度 "强劲 "增长后，IMF 上调中国 2024、2025 年 GDP 增长预期
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周三表示，在经历了 "强劲 "的第一季度后，中国经济今年将增长 5%，并上调了早先预测的 4.6% 增长率，但预计未来几年增长将放缓。【原文：China's economy is set to grow 5% this year, after a "strong" first quarter, the International Monetary Fund said on Wednesday, upgrading its earlier forecast of 4.6% expansion though it expects slower growth in the years ahead.】

item.title: 巴西国会推进对低价在线订单征税的法案
item.description: 巴西国会下议院周二批准了一项法案的主要文本，该法案将对 50 美元以下的国际网购商品征收 20% 的新进口税，大大低于最初提议的较高税率。【原文：Brazil's lower house of Congress approved on Tuesday the main text of a bill that would enact a new 20% import tax on international online purchases under $50, significantly down from a higher tax rate that was originally proposed.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 4 月份消费者通胀意外偏高
item.description: 澳大利亚消费者价格通胀率在 4 月份意外升至五个月来的新高，部分原因是汽油、医疗和假日费用的上涨，这增加了下一步利率可能上调的风险。【原文：Australian consumer price inflation unexpectedly rose to a five-month high in April due in part to increases in petrol, health and holiday costs, adding to risks the next move in interest rates might be upward.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：默克接近以 13 亿美元现金收购眼药公司 EyeBio
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，默克公司（Merck & Co）即将以13亿美元现金收购眼科生物技术公司Eyebiotech，该协议可能会产生17亿美元的额外里程碑付款。【原文：Merck & Co is nearing a $1.3 billion cash deal to buy ophthalmology biotechnology company Eyebiotech in an agreement that could see an additional $1.7 billion in milestone payments, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 预计主要产油国将继续减产，石油价格上涨
item.description: 本周三，油价上涨，原因是人们预期主要产油国将在本周日的会议上继续减产，与此同时，随着夏季需求旺季的开始，燃料消耗量也将开始上升。【原文：Oil prices rose on Wednesday on expectations major producers will maintain production cuts at a meeting this Sunday at the same time fuel consumption should begin rising with the start of the peak summer demand season.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回亚马逊要求美国联邦贸易委员会撤销对 Prime 计划诉讼的请求
item.description: 美国西雅图的一名法官周二驳回了亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）提出的驳回美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）诉讼的请求，该诉讼指控亚马逊公司在未经数百万消费者同意的情况下将他们纳入其付费的亚马逊 Prime 服务。【原文：A U.S. judge in Seattle on Tuesday rejected Amazon.com's request to dismiss a Federal Trade Commission lawsuit that accuses the company of enrolling millions of consumers into its paid Amazon Prime service without their consent.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Cathie Wood's Ark 收购了马斯克 xAI 公司的股份
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的方舟投资管理公司（Ark Investment Management）购买了埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 的股份，该公司上市后的估值为 240 亿美元。【原文：Cathie Wood's Ark Investment Management had purchased a stake in xAI, Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup with a post-money valuation of $24 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 在合并猜测中，巴西 Gol 航空公司母公司与 Azul 航空公司展开谈判
item.description: 巴西航空公司 Gol GOLL4.SA 的母公司 Gol GOLL4.SA 已开始与竞争对手 Azul 进行谈判，以 "探索机会"。【原文：The parent company of Brazilian airline Gol GOLL4.SA has started talks with rival Azul to "explore opportunities," both airlines said on Monday, following media reports earlier this year that pointed to a potential merger.】

item.title: 法官保证特斯拉不会在特拉华州以外地区对马斯克的薪酬裁决提出异议
item.description: 特拉华州法官宣布埃隆-马斯克创纪录的特斯拉薪酬方案无效，她告诉案件双方，电动汽车制造商向她保证，不会利用即将举行的股东投票来攻击她的裁决。【原文：The Delaware judge who voided Elon Musk's record Tesla pay package told the parties in the case that she felt assured by the electric vehicle maker that it would not use an upcoming shareholder vote to attack her ruling.】

item.title: 摩根大通在俄亥俄州大楼爆炸后进行安全检查
item.description: 美国俄亥俄州扬斯敦一栋大楼发生爆炸，摩根大通银行发言人在 X 上发布了一段所谓的爆炸视频，并在回答相关问题时表示，摩根大通正与当地官员保持密切联系。【原文：JPMorgan Chase is in close contact with local officials after a building explosion in Youngstown, Ohio, a bank spokesperson said in response to questions after a video of the purported blast was posted on X.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒要求路易斯安那州调查其股票交易情况
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体平台 "真理社交"（Truth Social）的所有者公司周二表示，已致函路易斯安那州金融机构办公室专员，要求对其股票交易中涉嫌的 "非法活动 "展开调查。【原文：The company that owns Donald Trump's social media platform Truth Social said on Tuesday it has sent a letter to the commissioner of the Louisiana Office of Financial Institutions to open an investigation into alleged "illicit activities" in the trading of its shares.】

item.title: 早间竞价：关注日本消费者和澳大利亚 CPI
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 马斯克为投资者提供工厂参观机会，寻求对其薪酬方案的支持
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）将为在即将召开的股东大会上就其 560 亿美元薪酬方案投票的 15 名特斯拉股东提供工厂参观机会，这是这家电动汽车制造商在法院驳回其薪酬方案后为争取选票所做的最新努力。【原文：Elon Musk is offering factory tours to 15 Tesla shareholders who vote on his $56 billion pay package at the upcoming meeting, the latest effort by the electric vehicle maker to rally votes for the compensation after a court struck it down.】

item.title: 法拉第未来撤回全年产量预期
item.description: 电动汽车制造商法拉第未来公司（Faraday Future）周二表示，由于目前的市场状况和资金水平，该公司将撤回2024年的生产预测。【原文：Electric vehicle maker Faraday Future said on Tuesday it was withdrawing its production forecast for 2024 due to current market conditions and levels of funding.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司重申第二季度盈利预期
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines Holdings）周二表示，该公司继续预计第二季度每股利润将在 3.75 美元至 4.25 美元之间。【原文：United Airlines Holdings said on Tuesday the airline continues to expect second-quarter profit to be between $3.75 and $4.25 per share.】

item.title: 美国航空公司下调第二季度利润预期
item.description: 美国航空公司周二下调了第二季度利润预期，导致该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌约 4%。【原文：American Airlines on Tuesday cut its second-quarter profit forecast, sending the shares of the carrier down about 4% in aftermarket trading.】

item.title: 美国财政部为航空公司权证拍卖设定 4.92 亿美元的最低价格
item.description: 美国财政部已确定在下周的拍卖中寻求至少 4.92 亿美元的总金额，用于出售政府为换取 COVID-19 援助而获得的购买美国航空公司股份的认股权证。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department has set a minimum of $492 million in total it is seeking in next week's auctions to sell warrants to purchase shares in U.S. airlines the government received in exchange for COVID-19 assistance.】

item.title: 交易应用 Robinhood 推出 10 亿美元回购计划
item.description: 交易应用 Robinhood Markets 周二表示，将从第三季度开始，在两到三年内回购价值高达 10 亿美元的股票。【原文：Trading app Robinhood Markets said on Tuesday it would repurchase shares worth up to $1 billion over a two to three year period starting from the third quarter.】

item.title: Verizon 将 Peacock 添加到流媒体中心，为用户提供优惠的 YouTube 高级计划
item.description: Verizon 周二表示，它已将 Comcast 的 Peacock 纳入其流媒体订阅中心，并计划以折扣价提供 YouTube Premium 和 myPlan 订阅服务。【原文：Verizon said on Tuesday that it added Comcast's Peacock to its streaming subscription hub and plans to offer YouTube Premium at a discounted rate with myPlan subscriptions.】

item.title: 人工智能宠儿英伟达市值飙升逼近苹果
item.description: 本周二，英伟达（Nvidia）股价大涨约 6%，创下历史新高，在华尔街巨头的大洗牌中，这家人工智能芯片制造商的股票市值距离超越苹果公司还差约 1,000 亿美元。【原文：Nvidia's shares rallied around 6% to hit a record high on Tuesday, leaving the AI chipmaker's stock market value about $100 billion away from overtaking Apple in a major reshuffle of Wall street's biggest players.】

item.title: 消息人士称，即使收购谈判的最后期限临近，必和必拓和盎格鲁集团仍将坚持到底
item.description: 五位消息人士称，必和必拓周二在与英美资源集团（Anglo American）的收购要约谈判中努力寻找共同点，在这家全球最大矿商提交有约束力收购要约的最后期限临近之际，必和必拓没有做出新的让步。【原文：BHP was struggling to find common ground with Anglo American on Tuesday in talks over its takeover offer, with no new concessions as a deadline nears for the world's biggest miner to submit a binding offer, five sources said.】
